entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Cold Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:24 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -18.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Cold Lake 08:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -18.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -21.4°C
Wind: ESE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
